archimate:Goal.name: Create a website to educate the organization on QSP role and reponsibilities & expectations from QSP
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Meeting with Mikael Lingskog 9/5: Will require too much effort, which is why this should be scrapped, but Lingskog doesn't mind if Owen want to do something about this when it comes to architecture. Owen's meeting with Mikael Lingskog 10/5: Lingskog clarified that we will keep the content jan drasal did with him and update it.
We're no longer Quality, Security & Privacy. This goal is deprecated since we'll keep what's done on the security website.
